name: Alta Technologies
overview:
We specialize in used and refurbished Cisco Dell HP IBM xSeries pSeries Tape Library Total Storage and SUN Microsystems within the global marketplace.

Our professional staff of technicians tests each product in our on-site data center before it hits our shelves.

At Alta Technologies, our priority is to provide tailored solutions for each customer’s specific needs. We provide consistent, dependable service, and we hold ourselves to the highest ethical standards.

For bids on existing assets please fill out our request for quote form with detailed descriptions of your saleable equipment or call our sales staff at 1-800-546-2582 for immediate assistance.

Whether you are looking to upgrade or replace components, refresh your data center, or upgrade your networking equipment, Alta is the answer.

Specialties Cisco, SUN Microsystems, Dell, HP, IBM pSeries, xSeries, Tape Libary, System Storage
